encyclopedia.content: 概述 译 名 从今以后/通灵感应锛埜埏級/生死接触锛執級片 名 Hereafter 年 代 2010 国 家 美国 类 别 惊悚 语 言 英语/法语 片 长 129 min 导 演 克林特·伊斯特伍德 Clint Eastwood 主 演 马特·达蒙 Matt Damon ....George Lonegan 布莱丝·达拉斯·霍华德 Bryce Dallas Howard ....Melanie 西西·迪·法兰丝 Cécile De France ....Marie LeLay 弗兰基·麦克拉伦 Frankie McLaren ....Marcus / Jason 蒂埃里·钮维 Thierry N

entry.def: Hereafter means from this time onwards.

example.ex: I realised how hard life was going to be for me hereafter.
example.tran: 我意识到从今以后我的生活将会多么艰难。

entry.tran: （用于法律文书或书面英语中，引出已经提及的人或事物的缩略）在本文中其余部分，以下
entry.def: In legal documents and in written English, hereafter is used to introduce information about an abbreviation that will be used in the rest of the text to refer to the person or thing just mentioned.

example.ex: Michel Foucault (1972), The Archaeology of Knowledge; hereafter this text will be abbreviated as AK.
example.tran: 米歇尔·福柯（1972），《知识考古学》，下文简称AK。

entry.def: The hereafter is sometimes used to refer to the time after you have died, or to the life which some people believe you have after you have died.

means.word_mean: 1. in a subsequent part of this document or statement or matter etc.;

sentences.sentence: "the landlord demises unto the tenant the premises hereinafter called the demised premises"

means.word_mean: 2. in a future life or state;
3. following this in time or order or place; after this;

sentences.sentence: "hereafter you will no longer receive an allowance"
